definition: to gather together/to investigate/to entangle/to correct
"silk" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 120), occurring in 红, 绿, 累 etc/also pr. [mi4]
to be in a tangle/to nag
to intertwine/to band together (with)/to link up (with)/twisted/tangled/confused/to be at a loss

sentences.english: Chen Duxiu Corrected the left-wing three times during the period of the Great revolution which is reasonable.
sentences.chinese: 大革命時期陳獨秀的三次糾“左”皆是無可厚非的。

sentences.english: This sticking point would affect a grand total of, say, ten players.
sentences.chinese: 而這個糾結點只會影響到攏共十名左右的球員。

sentences.english: This paper gives a circuit of correcting single error after decoding recover.
sentences.chinese: 本文還具體給出了譯碼恢復後糾單個錯的電路。

sentences.english: An burst-error-correcting scheme, which interleavig Hamming coding, for the serial communication of single-chip microcomputer is presented.
sentences.chinese: 給出了一種單片機串行通信中糾突發錯誤的方案。
